LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.3.label: 悪くない食堂
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.3.descr: 私は、悪くない食堂で食事した。
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.4.label: わずかに豪華な食堂
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.4.descr: 私は、わずかに豪華な食堂で食事した。
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.5.label: やや豪華な食堂
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.5.descr: 私は、豪華な食堂で食事した。
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.6.label: とても豪華な食堂
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.6.descr: 私は、とても豪華な食堂で食事した。
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.7.label: 極めて豪華な食堂
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.7.descr: 私は、極めて豪華な食堂で、食事を摂った。ずっと、こうしていたい。
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.8.label: 信じられないくらい豪華な食堂
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.8.descr: 私は、信じられないくらい豪華な食堂で、食事を摂った。ずっと、こうしていたい。
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.9.label: 奇跡的なぐらい豪華な食堂
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.9.descr: 私は、奇跡的なぐらい豪華な食堂で、食事を摂った。ずっと、こうしていたい。
私は、悪くない娯楽室で楽しんだ。
わずかに豪華な娯楽室
私は、ナイスな娯楽室で時間を過ごした。
私は、やや豪華な娯楽室で、素敵な時間を過ごした。
私は、とても豪華な娯楽室で、素敵な時間を過ごした。
私は、極めて豪華な娯楽室で、素敵な時間を過ごした。ずっと、こうしていたい。
信じられないくらい豪華な娯楽室
私は、信じられないくらい豪華な娯楽室で、素敵な時間を過ごした。ずっと、こうしていたい。
奇跡的なぐらい豪華な娯楽室
私は、奇跡的なぐらい豪華な娯楽室で、素敵な時間を過ごした。ずっと、こうしていたい。

rep.trans: I had to sleep in an awful room.

LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.3.label: 悪くない寝室
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.3.description: I got to sleep in a pretty decent bedroom.
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.4.label: ちょっと豪華な寝室
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.4.description: I got to sleep in a slightly impressive bedroom. I like it.
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.5.label: 豪華な寝室
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.5.description: I slept in an impressive bedroom. It was great.
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.6.label: とても豪華な寝室
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.6.description: I slept in a very impressive bedroom. I love it.
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.7.label: 極めて豪華な寝室
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.7.description: I slept in an extremely impressive bedroom. It was marvelous.
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.8.label: 信じられないくらい豪華な寝室
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.8.description: I slept in an unbelievably impressive bedroom. It was truly astounding.
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.9.label: 奇跡的なぐらい豪華な寝室
LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.9.description: I slept in a heavenly bedroom. It was wondrous.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.0.label: さえない宿舎
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.0.description: I had to sleep in an awful barrack. Not only was it a horrible room, but I also had to share it!
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.1.label: わずかに豪華な宿舎
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.1.description: I had to sleep in a dull barrack. Not only that, but I also had to share it with other people.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.2.label: 豪華な宿舎
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.2.description: I had to sleep in a mediocre barrack with other people around. I really don't like this.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.3.label: とても豪華な宿舎
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.3.description: I slept in a decent barrack, but I really dislike sharing a sleeping space.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.4.label: 極めて豪華な宿舎
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.4.description: I got to sleep in a pretty nice barrack. But I really don't like sharing a room with others.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.5.label: 信じられないくらい豪華な宿舎
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.5.description: I got to sleep in an impressive barrack. It sucks that I had to share it, though.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.6.label: 奇跡的なぐらい豪華な宿舎
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.6.description: I slept in a very impressive barrack. I'm annoyed I had to share it, though.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.7.label: extremely impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.7.description: I slept in an extremely impressive barrack. It almost makes up for having to share it.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.8.description: The barrack I slept in was so impressive that I don't even mind sharing it.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.9.description: I slept in a barrack that was simply wondrous. Even sharing such a space makes me happy.
